name: Shape Stacker
description:
This game is a physics stacking game, where the objective is to reach as high as possible. It makes use of Unity’s physics system to handle movement of objects and grabbing and moving them by the user. I ended up making the game for Android, using my own phone, a HTC One M8s, to test the game.

The source code can be accessed in its respective repository on my GitHub here.

You can also see an extended explaination of the game on my portfolio site here.
